content: one of the ends up to the top of your turning chain then poke it back to front through the top of the turning chain and then front to back through the base outside edge of your ch10 repeat the back to front front to back motion and tighten tie a knot if you d like then weave in your end optional round in pictures start away from where your other rounds started when you get to where r3 was supposed to be joined just crochet normally following the pattern do a single_crochet or 2sc in the base of the ch10 pull the ladders back into shape and do the next single_crochet or 2sc into your turning chain for the previous round
